name: Boris the Cat
description:
Help Boris the cat find different Ukrainian traditional foods in this wholesome platformer!

Game controls:

  • Hold the mouse left button to charge your jump - the longer you hold, the further the distance you can jump!
  • If you are holding the left mouse button and want to cancel the charging - just hit the right button.
  • Use the left and right arrow keys to rotate around the levels.
  • Finish each level by collecting the foods that are flying around.

The project was made during the United with Ukraine game jam by a team of 4 developers.
